name: Mint
description: This game tells a story about an alien chasing escaped convict, to take him back to his own planet. The hero alien took form of a toothpaste to balance his body in earth's atmosphere. Mint is appointed to bring back Lugal, an escapee from its home planet.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7,8,10 Processor: AMD Phenom II x64  840 (4CPUs), ~3.2GHz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GTX 650Ti DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 30 MB available space Sound Card: Realtek Digital Output
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7,8,10 Processor: AMD Phenom II x64  840 (4CPUs), ~3.2GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GTX 650Ti DirectX: Version 12 Storage: 30 MB available space Sound Card: Realtek Digital Output
